name: Arthurion Assault
description:
Please play the downloadable build if possible (Windows and Linux only). Scroll down to find it. Controls:
  • Move with the WASD keys.
  • Shoot with Spacebar or Left Click.
  • Pause with the P key.
How to play:
  • Shoot as many enemies as you can.
  • Hitting enemies or terrain lowers your health.
  • The game restarts if you lose all your health.
Known Bugs:
  • Voice lines (Web Build) : The voice lines sound cut off. This is because audio modification is not saved in Unity HTML builds.
  • Win screen buttons don't work.
Credits

This project was made following the online course Complete C# Unity Developer 3D - Learn to Code Making Games by instructors Ben Tristem and Rick Davison in the Udemy platform.

The course provided instruction on the programming and design of the game. However, I take credit in creating the terrain, as well as the story, writing, and level design.
